name: Plex Slack Music Status
description: Use Plex webhooks to keep your status up to date with your playback

PAUSE_EMOJI.description: Emoji to use when paused if none provided in querystring.

PLAY_EMOJI.description: Emoji to use when playing if none provided in querystring.

PLAYER.description: The identifier of the Plex player to watch. If not provided, nor in the querystring, any player playing music will be accepted.
